alert.note: Alert for Midland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 1:32AM CDT until May 20 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL MIDLAND COUNTY... At 131 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Midland, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Measured by ASOS at KMAF. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Midland, Midland International Air and Space Port, Warfield, Cotton Flat and Skywest Airport. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 124 and 141. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
